description:
Ubuntu 22.04.5 LTS is now avaialble for download as the fifth and last point release to the Ubuntu 22.04 LTS operating system series, powered by Linux kernel 6.8 from Ubuntu 24.04 LTS.

The post Ubuntu 22.04.5 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) Is Now Available Powered by Linux Kernel 6.8 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Ubuntu 22.04.5 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) Is Now Available Powered by Linux Kernel 6.8

description:
Ardour 8.7 open-source digital audio workstation (DAW) is now available for download with track dragging, combined rulers, MIDI Scene markers, parallel disk I/O, and more.

title: Ardour 8.7 DAW Released with Track Dragging, Combined Rulers, MIDI Scene Markers

description:

description:

description:
